scripts.codepush:init: duxapp rn codepushInit android && duxapp rn codepushInit ios
scripts.codepush:key: duxapp rn codepushDeploymentKey android && duxapp rn codepushDeploymentKey ios
scripts.codepush:android: duxapp runtime enterFile && duxapp rn codepush android && cd .
scripts.codepush:ios: duxapp runtime enterFile && duxapp rn codepush ios && cd .
scripts.codepush: duxapp runtime enterFile && duxapp rn codepush android && duxapp runtime enterFile && duxapp rn codepush ios && cd .
